comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Six similar Bain Collection scenes labeled Battle of Haelen: www.flickr.com/search/?ss=2&w=8623220@N02&q=haele...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Cropped from original Agence Meurisse photo shown at Bibliotheque Nationale de France's Gallica site, with following caption: "En Belgique : combats de Haelen et de Diest : après la bataille, enlèvement des cadavres de chevaux" [In Belgium: Battle of Haelen and Diest: After the battle, removal of the dead horses] Pub. Date 1914

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for the matching photo from the Gallica site.  The title confirms that this is the aftermath of the Battle of Haelen.  Good find!
